officialTitle: Can Recombinant Human Intrinsic Factor Be Used for Evaluation of the Vitamin B12 Absorption?
inclusionCriteria:
Patients suspected to have vitamin B12 deficiency defined as a plasma vitamin B12 below the reference interval (\<200 pmol/L).
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria: Patients who were pregnant, nursing or not able to give written informed consent were excluded.
